creator: ps@nomensa.com
text:
Browser: firefox 1.0 Preview Release

1) load kupu
2) save with/without editing
 
JavaScript errors (see attachment)

Yes, kupu refresh problems prevent you from seeing the changes and it also
prevents you from exiting kupu.
A refresh and the exit button works -  which then shows the changes you have
made (in my case simple text changes).
creator: ps@nomensa.com
